fields.name: accumulated_freezing_degree_days
fields.label: Accumulated Freezing Degree Days
fields.description: Maximum cumulative total of differences in average daily temperature and freezing for consecutive days across the aggregation period.

fields.name: average_high_temperature
fields.label: "Average High Temperature
fields.description: Aggregated average high temperature

fields.name: average_low_temperature
fields.label: Average Low Temperature
fields.description: Aggregated average low temperature

fields.name: cooling_degree_days
fields.label: Cooling Degree Days
fields.description: Total difference of daily average temperature to a reference base temperature

fields.name: diurnal_temperature_range
fields.label: Diurnal Temperature Range
fields.description: Average difference between daily max and daily min temperature

fields.name: dry_spells
fields.label: Dry Spells
fields.description: Total number of times per period that there are 5 or more consecutive days without precipitation

fields.name: extreme_cold_events
fields.label: Extreme Cold Events
fields.description: Total number of times per period daily minimum temperature is below the specified percentile of historic observations

fields.name: extreme_heat_events
fields.label: Extreme Heat Events
fields.description: Total number of times per period daily maximum temperature exceeds the specified percentile of historic observations

fields.name: extreme_precipitation_events
fields.label: Extreme Precipitation Events
fields.description: Total number of times per period daily average precipitation rate exceeds the specified percentile of historic observations

fields.name: frost_days
fields.label: Frost Days
fields.description: Number of days per period in which the daily low temperature is below the freezing point of water

fields.name: heat_wave_duration_index
fields.label: Heat Wave Duration Index
fields.description: Maximum period of consecutive days with daily high temperature greater than 5C above historic norm

fields.name: heat_wave_incidents
fields.label: Heat Wave Incidents
fields.description: Number of times daily high temperature exceeds 5C above historic norm for at least 5 consecutive days

fields.name: heating_degree_days
fields.label: Heating Degree Days
fields.description: Total difference of daily average temperature to a reference base temperature

fields.name: max_consecutive_dry_days
fields.label: Max Consecutive Dry Days
fields.description: Maximum number of consecutive days with no precipitation

fields.name: max_high_temperature
fields.label: Maximum High Temperature
fields.description: Maximum high temperature

fields.name: max_temperature_threshold
fields.label: Max Temperature Threshold
fields.description: Number of days where high temperature, generated from daily data using all requested models, fulfills the comparison

fields.name: min_low_temperature
fields.label: Minimum Low Temperature
fields.description: Minimum low temperature

fields.name: min_temperature_threshold
fields.label: Min Temperature Threshold
fields.description: Number of days where min temperature, generated from daily data using all requested models, fulfils the comparison

fields.name: percentile_high_temperature
fields.label: Percentile High Temperature
fields.description: The specified percentile of high temperature for each timespan. Defaults to 50th percentile (Median)

fields.name: percentile_low_temperature
fields.label: Percentile Low Temperature
fields.description: The specified percentile of low temperature for each timespan. Defaults to 50th percentile (Median)

fields.name: percentile_precipitation
fields.label: Percentile Precipitation
fields.description: The specified percentile of precipitation rate for each timespan. Defaults to 50th percentile (Median)

fields.name: precipitation_threshold
fields.label: Precipitation Threshold
fields.description: Number of days where precipitation rate, generated from daily data using all requested models, fulfils the comparison

fields.name: total_precipitation
fields.label: Total Precipitation
fields.description: Total precipitation
